title: Children of Samoa
creator_credit: Dave Gibson, Gibson Film Productions and John Anderson
brief_description: Looks at the lifestyle of two children and their family, who live in a small village in Western Samoa. They are seen having school lessons, fishing, participating in traditional play activities, evening prayers, food preparation and a feast.
